data.lyric:
[ti:Skin]
[ar:Sabrina Carpenter]
[al:Skin]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Skin - Sabrina Carpenter (莎布琳娜·卡潘特)
[00:01.43]Lyrics by：Ryan McMahon/Sabrina Carpenter/Tia Scola
[00:02.87]Composed by：Ryan McMahon/Sabrina Carpenter/Tia Scola
[00:04.31]Maybe we could have been friends
[00:06.49]If I met you in another life
[00:08.88]Maybe then we could pretend
[00:10.76]There's no gravity in the words we write
[00:13.21]Maybe you didn't mean it
[00:15.38]Maybe "blonde" was the only rhyme
[00:18.60]The only rhyme
[00:20.73]Want my heart to be breakin' breakin' no
[00:25.30]I'm happy and you hate it hate it oh
[00:29.91]And I'm not asking you to let it go
[00:34.11]But you been tellin' your side
[00:36.45]So I'll be telling mine
[00:39.02]Oh
[00:40.36]You can try
[00:42.29]To get under my under my under my skin
[00:44.60]While he's on mine
[00:46.83]Yeah all on my all on my all on my skin
[00:49.21]I wish you knew that even you
[00:53.43]Can't get under my skin if I don't let you in
[00:58.41]You're tellin' it how you see it
[01:00.52]Like truth is whatever you decide
[01:03.01]Some people will believe it
[01:05.06]And some will read in between the lines
[01:07.38]You're putting me in the spotlight
[01:09.68]But I've been under it all my life
[01:12.88]Said all my life
[01:15.15]Want my heart to be breakin' breakin' no
[01:19.63]I'm happy and you hate it hate it oh
[01:24.29]And I'm not asking you to let it go
[01:28.61]But you been tellin' your side
[01:30.95]So I'll be telling mine mine
[01:34.86]You can try
[01:36.60]To get under my under my under my skin
[01:39.01]While he's on mine
[01:41.09]Yeah all on my all on my all on my skin
[01:43.53]I wish you knew that even you
[01:47.76]Can't get under my skin if I don't let you in oh
[01:52.81]You can try
[01:54.57]To get under my under my under my skin
[01:57.02]While he's on mine
[01:59.25]Yeah all on my all on my all on my skin
[02:01.56]I wish you knew that even you
[02:05.92]Can't get under my skin if I don't let you in oh
[02:11.23]I just hope that one day
[02:13.41]We both can laugh about it
[02:15.71]When it's not in our face
[02:18.03]Won't have to dance around it
[02:20.33]Don't drive yourself insane
[02:23.28]It won't always be this way
[02:29.20]You can try
[02:31.06]To get under my under my under my skin
[02:33.61]While he's on mine
[02:36.18]Yeah all on my all on my all on my skin
[02:39.00]I wish you knew that even you
[02:43.59]Can't get under my skin if I don't let you in
data.trans:
[ti:Skin]
[ar:Sabrina Carpenter]
[al:Skin]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.43]//
[00:02.87]//
[00:04.31]如果我来生有幸遇见你
[00:06.49]也许我们可以成为朋友
[00:08.88]也许我们可以假装
[00:10.76]我们写下的歌词都毫无意义
[00:13.21]也许你不是故意的
[00:15.38]也许金发女郎这个词只是服务于歌词本身
[00:18.60]只是服务于歌词本身
[00:20.73]想让我肝肠寸断 伤心不已
[00:25.30]我过得很开心 而你心生怨恨
[00:29.91]我不是要求你放下过去
[00:34.11]可你总是自说自话
[00:36.45]所以 我决定吐露心声
[00:39.02]//
[00:40.36]你可以尝试一番
[00:42.29]左右我的情绪
[00:44.60]当他在我身边时
[00:46.83]我的喜怒哀乐都写在脸上
[00:49.21]我希望你知道 即使是你
[00:53.43]只要我我对你紧锁心扉 你就无法影响我的情绪
[00:58.41]你说着你的看法
[01:00.52]仿佛真相由你决定
[01:03.01]有些人会深信不疑
[01:05.06]有些人会明白言外之意
[01:07.38]你让我成为全场的焦点
[01:09.68]可我一生都备受瞩目
[01:12.88]讲述我的一生
[01:15.15]想让我肝肠寸断 伤心不已
[01:19.63]我过得很开心 而你怀恨在心
[01:24.29]我不是要求你放下过去
[01:28.61]可你总是自说自话
[01:30.95]所以 我决定吐露心声
[01:34.86]你可以尝试一番
[01:36.60]左右我的情绪
[01:39.01]当他在我身边时
[01:41.09]我的喜怒哀乐都写在脸上
[01:43.53]我希望你知道 即使是你
[01:47.76]只要我对你紧锁心扉 你就无法影响我的情绪
[01:52.81]你可以尝试一番
[01:54.57]左右我的情绪
[01:57.02]当他在我身边时
[01:59.25]我的喜怒哀乐都写在脸上
[02:01.56]我希望你知道 即使是你
[02:05.92]只要我对你紧锁心扉 你就无法影响我的情绪
[02:11.23]我只是希望有那么一天
[02:13.41]我们可以一笑置之
[02:15.71]即使我们无法微笑
[02:18.03]我们不必拐弯抹角
[02:20.33]不要固执己见 让自己失去理智
[02:23.28]世事变化无常
[02:29.20]你可以尝试一番
[02:31.06]左右我的情绪
[02:33.61]当他在我身边时
[02:36.18]我的喜怒哀乐都写在脸上
[02:39.00]我希望你知道 即使是你
[02:43.59]只要我对你紧锁心扉 你就无法影响我的情绪
